description: a(n)^2 is the smallest square containing exactly n 7's.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number
mathematica: a[n_] := Module[{i = 1}, While[DigitCount[i^2][[7]] != n, i++ ]; i]; - Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 22 2006
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 1999.
